ModMetaData.name: 天轴自用扩展 Polarisbloc Extension
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
本模组是自用的一些对于天轴模组的扩展内容，目前内容包含： - 在研究完成纳米修复装置后，会像人格核机会任务一样，生成一个任务，可以获取到科技核心，但是两次任务之间有一年的间隔时间
This mod is a collection of extended functionalities for Polarisbloc, including: - After researching repairer nano haze, a quest will be generated (like the ai persona core quest), which can obtain a tech core, however, there is a one-year interval between two requests
